continuousshootingrate: Up to 7 fps in Continuous Advance Priority AE mode, Up to 6 fps in Continuous mode
label3: SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Stick Pro Duo, Memory Stick PRO-HG Duo memory card support
focusmodes: Single-shot AF, Auto AF, Continuous AF, Manual Focus
autohdr: Auto Exposure Diff., Adjustable Exposure Diff. (1 – 6EV in 1EV steps)
compensation: Approx. 2.5 – 4 steps decrease in shutter speeds (varies according to conditions and lens used)
fileformat: JPEG (DCF2.0, Exif 2.3), RAW (ARW 2.2 format), RAW + JPEG
